attributes.action: consider stricter Credit Control when purchasing goods via Catalogues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DEBT within society is the main cause of social problems and decline because even people on low incomes are entitled to satisfy their ‘Eager Desires‘ and they will, even if it means getting into debt. 

The solution to the problems of DEBT, is stricter credit control by catalogue companies who should sell their goods directly to a person and not via agents receiving commission. This will prevent people purchasing goods via several agents and various catalogues at the same time.
attributes.creator_name: Mr Joseph Robert Neil James & Mrs Margaret James
